info.title: Orders API Documentation
info.description: Swagger API Documentation for Orders managament API

get.summary: Get a list of orders with optional filters

description.example: Et cupiditate aut est sed nobis.

post.summary: Store a newly created order in the database along with its products. Request expects an array of products with quantity

get.summary: Display the specified order along with its associated products by ID

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve

description.example: Nam placeat quidem et omnis inventore.

put.summary: Update the specified order and its associated products. Request expects an array of products with quantity.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to update

delete.summary: Remove the specified order from the database along with its product associations.

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to delete

204.description: Order deleted successfully. No content Response
